_header: Busy in study be thou child
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 286; translating ‘Sidulus in studio puer in templo pius esto…’, which follows.
_description: Advice on good behaviour — two short couplets

OxfBal354.Transcription:
Besy in stody be þou child& in þe hall meke &
                    mylde& at þe table mery & glade& at bedde softe &
                    sadde
OxfBal354.Note: In a collection of 55 proverbs in English and Latin.

Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile

         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
